entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -40.0°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
